article.Heading: GST India: Pan-India poll
article.Summary: Taxes on over 200 items have been slashed by the GST Council. Will these benefits be passed on to consumers soon? LocalCircles conducted an online poll across 100 cities in India to gauge the mood among companies and the industry. CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan caught up with Yatish Rajawat, Chief Strategy Officer at LocalCircles to talk about this.
article.Body:
Taxes on over 200 items have been slashed by the GST Council. Will these benefits be passed on to consumers soon? LocalCircles conducted an online poll across 100 cities in India to gauge the mood among companies and the industry. CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan caught up with Yatish Rajawat, Chief Strategy Officer at LocalCircles to talk about this.

Watch video for moreâ€¦
